overview: The film takes place in the universe of H.P. lovecraft. A museum director tries to find out the secret of an old door. “The Book was written by the man benhind the door. But if you just have the book, you can not see him anymore. And if you just have the door, without the book – than it´s just an old peace made out of wood. But when you have both – paper and wood, than you will see the man who wrote the book.”
title: Rood
